# Mask, Winged
## Overview
**Aura** faint transmutation; **CL** 5th

**Slot** â€” (see text)

**Price** 13,000 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

The edges of this full-face mask are made to resemble feathers or wings. The wearer can use *[[Fly (Spell)|fly]]* at will, but glows with white light (as a *[[Light (Spell)|light]]* spell) whenever this ability is used. A mask counts as a pair of lenses for limitations on wearing multiple items of the same type.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Fly (Spell)|fly]]**,* *[[Light (Spell)|light]]*

**Cost** 6,500 gp

**Source:** Magic of Faerun (WotC), pg. 168
